message: هشتري apple macintosh. ياريت اللي عنده تجربة معاه يقول لي رأيه. أشتري إيه و ليه خاصة إني هستعمله ل ruby development

data.message:
If you are buying a mac just to do ruby on it then don't. Buy a mac because its rock solid performance, quality of product and exceptional user experience are unmatched. 

It looks great, feels better, built for humans and made by perfectionist.

If you're coming from a Linux background, don't expect an out of the box developer experience. It's certainly a Unix but super well packaged. So getting your build environment will be costly in time and effort but once it's up and running, bam.. it's frigging awesome.
انا بستخدم hackintosh  و رويي برضه و كويس الي حد ما (عشان هو مش ماك فعلا) فأكيد الماك هيبقي كويس جدا اتوكل علي الله :D
